title: What are examples of argumentative essay paragraphs? - Quora

response.answer_text: See on http://www.Quora.com Bruce R. Bain's answer to Is it true that we use the term that the universe is governed by physical laws metaphorically, and if there really are laws where they exist?
Google is your friend for this kinda thing: Argumentative Essays // Purdue Writing Lab Make sure you look for .edu sites.
